mapper.select: /* account_SQL.selectAccount */ SELECT A.IDX, A.ACC_ID, A.SNS_TYPE, A.ACC_NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE_NUM, A.USER_IMG, A.RIGHT, A.IS_DEL, A.NOTE, A.LAST_LOGIN_IP, DATE_FORMAT(A.JOIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS JOIN_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS LAST_LOGIN_DT, DATE_FORMAT(A.MODIFY_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MODIFY_DT FROM ACCOUNT AS A WHERE A.IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: /* account_SQL.updateAccount */ UPDATE ACCOUNT SET ACC_NAME = #{accName}, EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_IMG = #{userImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
/* account_SQL.deleteAccount */ UPDATE ACCOUNT SET IS_DEL = 'Y', MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
